uploadRoutineNudgeDescription: Click here or drag file for upload.
createRoutineConflictErrorMsg: Routine name in configuration already exist.
editRoutineConflictMsg: Name in configuration file doesn't match with routine
deleteRoutineModalWarningMsg:
Would you liked to delete routine {{name}}?
Routine and pipelines cannot be restored.
pipelineEmptyDescription:
Create routine and run pipeline for tests.

You can automate the testing process by integrating routines with CI and running them



Click here for more information
destTestNoCpuGraphDataDescription: There's no CPU usage information when this task was executed.
destTestNoMemoryGraphDataDescription: There's no memory usage information when this task was executed.
destTestNoFpsGraphDataDescription: There's no FPS usage information when this task was executed.
routineGuiEditorJobNeedDescription: This job will be executed after the predecessor jobs are completed.
routineGuiEditorJobDeviceDescription: This job will be executed on the devices with the selected tag or name.
routineGuiEditorJobDeviceGroupDescriptio: This job will be executed on the all devices with the selected tag. Cannot select device if this option is enabled.
routineGuiEditorJobScreenRecordDescripti: This job will record the screen of the device if the option is enabled.
routineGuiEditorJobAppPackageNameDescrip:
Select the platform to run on and the app package name.
The latest build version among apps with the same package name will be executed.
routineGuiEditorStepActionDescription:
Install app: Install and run app before test.
Run test: Run test script.
routineGuiEditorStepWorkingDirDescriptio: Select the working directory for command.
routineGuiEditorRunTestActionDescription: Install and run application or browser and run test scripts. This action contains checkout, and prepare actions.
routineGuiEditorCheckoutActionDescriptio: Checkout git repository from integrated remote repository.
routineGuiEditorPrepareActionDescription: Install application and run it. This action contains checkout and doesn't run test script.
